meta.ip: Isayas anak of Amus the migsulat of this document. Sabeka sikandin prophet of God, and there sikandin Lived of Yerusalem. The meaning/salvation of name ‘Isayas’, ‘The Master God the Egluwas.’ Nasulat this document of years 740 going to 680 of not yet born Yeshua. And/Now nabaad this of three part:

ip: : Nahuhud here the concerning the time ingginalatan of Asirya the Huda, the kingdom there to south. And/Now saw of Isayas tenged bes of sale of people, of pegkamasinupaken dan, and of lacking the trusting dan of God, the reason ke mania of migginalatan of Asirya the Huda. Impaay-ayaran panulua of Isayas the people and the teachers ran eg-ugpe them righteous/honest/sensible the hinimuwan and correct the judging. Impanpanayan din them emun ke not them egpammineg of speech of God, egkengareetan iya them. But intagne again of Isayas the birth of descendants of David of coming time iyan likes eg-ikulen of people, and coming the time due kalinaw of intiru world.

: Natagne here the concerning the coming pegkarakep and pegkeuyan of masulug people of Huda going to Babylon. And/Now impanengneng of prophet Isayas minsan like dutu, not egmahuye the people not egkaawaan of egkapallateng because egluwasen ded of God the people din and igpalibed din ded them there to Yerusalem so that egbunsud e man e of new living. The theme of this me chapter, the God the egbuut of egkeyitabu and the egplanu for of people din, and miglagkes also this of katuyuan dan there to all nations egpakarawat of blessing from God by means of Israel.

: Natagne also here the concerning the keugpe of people igpalibed ded of God there to Yerusalem. Nahuhud of Isayas here the me suhu of God concerning the righteous/honest/sensible living, correct judging, obedience of Day of Resting, sacrificing, and praying. And/Now egkabasa of this me chapter the speech inggamit of Yeshua of pegpanengneng chosen sikandin in order to preaching of good story (Isayas 61:1-2; Lukas 4:18-19.)
